message: Let's start with a fair 50/50 split, Bob.
I think I deserve a bit more, 60/40 is still quite fair.
Let's compromise, Bob.  I'll agree to a 55/45 split.
I can compromise too, 58/42 is the lowest I'm willing to go.
Bob, this is a final offer. I'm trying to meet you halfway, let's be reasonable and close this deal.
I'm not buying the 'final offer' bluff. I'll meet you at 57.5/42.5, that's my best offer yet.
Bob, we're running out of time. This is more than fair, let's settle this now before we both lose out.
We're indeed running out of time. I'll make a small concession, but this is as low as I'll go.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you more than I would accept.  Let's end this now and both get something!
